entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -15.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
